body_html: I solved this problem. As @azadef said, the problem is because of batch norm. We should set is_training=True in training and False in testing. Also, use train_op = slim.learning.create_train_op(). instead of train_op = optimizer.minimize().
body_text: I solved this problem. As @azadef said, the problem is because of batch norm. We should set is_training=True in training and False in testing. Also, use train_op = slim.learning.create_train_op(). instead of train_op = optimizer.minimize().
body: I solved this problem. As @azadef said, the problem is because of batch norm. We should set is_training=True in training and False in testing. Also, use train_op = slim.learning.create_train_op(). instead of train_op = optimizer.minimize().
